name: Phone Cleaner- Phone Optimize, Phone Speed Booster
description: Phone Cleaner - Speed Booster is an application that helps you optimize, speed up and clean up your phone. This is an Speed Booster, optimizes the system, cooler the CPU, cleans memory, saves battery when used and speeds up the charging process. Key features of Phone Cleaner include: Phone Booster: Eliminate background and resource-hungry applications to speed up your phone Junk Cleaner: Scans all system cache, app cache, log files, temp files and apk obsolete files and recommends removing them from your phone, freeing up memory and running your phone faster than Battery saver: Scan and remove running apps that drain your battery in a few simple steps, when your phone is running low on battery power, the app will prompt you to save battery power by removing apps run in the background CPU cooler: The CPU cooler can help your phone reduce CPU temperature with a simple operation. Report charging process: Every time you charge the battery, after unplugging the phone from the phone, there will be a full report of information during the charging process including: charging time, the number % of battery charged, battery charging speed ... Download and use Phone Cleaner now to speed up and optimize your phone. Please give the developer 1 review 5 * to support us Note: before you install Phone Cleaner please read our privacy policy carefully Any comments on products please send to mailbox macoretudio@gmail.com.
